_comment: This is a PLACEHOLDER for the staging environment Firebase configuration.
_instructions: 1. Create a Firebase project for staging (e.g., 'CyberVPN Staging')
2. Register an Android app with package name: com.cybervpn.cybervpn_mobile.staging
3. Download the google-services.json from Firebase Console
4. Replace this file with the downloaded google-services.json
5. DO NOT commit the real google-services.json to version control if it contains sensitive data
